text: We and our third-party service providers may collect Other Information in a variety of ways, including:

We and our service providers use the information for security purposes, to facilitate navigation, to display information more effectively, and to personalize your experience while visiting the Site, as well as for online tracking purposes.

How We Use and Disclose Other Information
If we are required to treat this information as Personal Information under applicable law, then, in addition to the uses listed in the "How We Collect Other Information" section above, we may use and disclose Other Information for all the purposes for which we use and disclose Personal Information.
Please note that we may use and disclose Other Information for any purpose, except where we are required to do otherwise under applicable law.
This means we collect and use your information only where: We are processing your information to protect our legal rights;
